name: Formtool-3119 As a MiLB fan, I would like to be able to make a purchase on a MiLB transactional form
Formtool-3068 As an Editor, I would like to include the order total and the Commerce order id in an email so that the fan has an additional point of reference when contacting customer service
Formtool-3083 [Bug] Prevent Duplicate Answers for Dropdown throws error on a transactional form
Formtool-2935 As an Editor, I would like the quantity selected for a product by a fan to conditionally show fields on a form
Formtool-3085 As an Editor, I would like to be able to add a gifting option to a transactional form so that a fan can gift a fellow fan
Formtool-3086 As a Fan, I would like the option to make a gift purchase on a form so I can buy something for a family member or friend
Formtool-3094 As a Fan, I would like a giftee email field on a form so that I can notify the recipient of my gift
Formtool-3095 As an Editor, I would like to be able to add a giftee email send date field to a transactional form so that a fan can specify when the recipient of their gift is notified
Formtool-2967 As an Editor, I would like to add a discount code field to a form so that a fan can save some $
Formtool-3116 As a Form Tool User, I would like to have deep linking using my MLB Okta account
Formtool-3097 As an Editor, I would like tags related to transactional forms so I can better categorize my forms
